name: WDM USA LIMITED
sampleDescriptions: Creation of a pavement friction management program within the US DOT, and funding opportunities for specialty contractors in the field of pavement friction measurement.
Promoting pavement friction measurement policy as part of the Highway Safety Improvement Program and crash safety data collected by the Department of Transportation.
